law.catch_line: Cost-containment feature requirement for program plans.
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, program plans shall contain cost containment features, which may include managed care and utilization management, to control the amount of high-cost policy losses without creating excessive adverse health care outcomes.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 20, effective April 10, 1998.
